
---
title: '定金 100 元：红米 Note 11 Pro 系列手机开启预售'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://qny.smzdm.com/202110/22/61721e31205601012.jpg_e600.jpg'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sat, 23 Oct 2021 03:39:38 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://qny.smzdm.com/202110/22/61721e31205601012.jpg_e600.jpg'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="fb95">小米京东自营旗舰店现已开启“Redmi Note 11 Pro/Pro+”预售，定金 100 元抵 200 元，加赠保值换新服务：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANkJK1olXDYCVV9cCUoSA2wKKx9KBVhdZAcYTQpVCHEWWQJLHBleSwUIFxlJX3EGWQJLHH5XWF5cCUoWAmoIGFklO2IEFQ1bakl3RTsSfw5MK1h4VAc1aEcbM2wPElISbQUAU1xbDE4UBF9rfDVPGX53Dho2YHsVAmoJGlMlC2gCVV9cCUoSA2wKK1sRWAMLVV5VD00nA2gKHlMRVQ8BU1hUDnsXC2g4RxlHHEQyZG5eOHsnAF8LKwV7XFUEVl5YD0J5WSgKEhwcWw5sVlleAU4WA2o4GVoUXwQy" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANkJK1olXDYCVV9cCUoSA2wKKx9KBVhdZAcYTQpVCHEWWQJLHBleSwUIFxlJX3EGWQJLHH5XWF5cCUoWAmoIGFklNARAK0A-Dx13BhlDb1JCJX52IyBfTkcbM2oJE1MQWgYFV25eCkwVBWsNGFwlPmFsDholfRFTaAc4G14lC2gCVV9cCUoSA2wKK1sWWgIAUVZdCE8nA2gKHlMRVQ8BU1ZeAXsXC2g4RxlHHEQyZG5eOHsnAF8LKwV7XFUCV1kNDE55WSgKEhwcDl1sUF1eAU4XAWY4GVoUXwQy" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=/pages/union/proxy/proxy?spreadUrl=https%3a%2f%2funion-click.jd.com%2fjdc%3fe%3d%26p%3dJF8BANkJK1olXDYCVV9cCUoSA2wKKx9KBVhdZAcYTQpVCHEWWQJLHBleSwUIFxlJX3EGWQJLHH5XWF5cCUoWAmoIGFklJV0FKQtYTh51V3VheiZJKAN_IB1YeEcbM2sLHloXVQcKXW5eCkwVBWsNGFwlPmFsDholfRFTaAc4G14lC2gCVV9cCUoSA2wKK1sWXAQEVFldAEMnA2gKHlMRVQ8BUl5eAHsXC2g4RxlHHEQyZG5eOHsnAF8LKwV7XFZSAVtZW0h5WSgKEhwcBFVsVllfD0gRAWk4GVoUXwQy&EA_PTAG=17078.27.380">点此查看</a>。</p><p data-vmark="ca3f">Redmi Note 11 Pro：预定提供 4 种颜色，6GB+128GB、8GB+128GB、8GB+256GB 三个版本可选。</p><p data-vmark="5905">Redmi Note 11 Pro+：预定提供 3 种颜色，6GB+128GB、8GB+128GB、8GB+256GB 三个版本可选。</p><p data-vmark="088e"><img src="https://qny.smzdm.com/202110/22/61721e31205601012.jpg_e600.jpg" alt="Redmi 红米 Note 11 系列 5G智能手机" title="定金 100 元：红米 Note 11 Pro 系列手机开启预售" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="93d2">Redmi Note 11 系列将于 10 月 28 日正式发布，当晚会公布售价。</p><p data-vmark="3769">Redmi Note 11 系列整机厚度为 8.34mm，采用直角塑料中框 + 玻璃机身 + 三星高刷 OLED 大屏。配备侧边指纹识别，后置三摄，前摄居中。</p><p data-vmark="0b95">根据此前爆料信息，Redmi Note 11 系列还将搭载 JBL 双扬声器、顶置 3.5mm 耳机孔、红外遥控功能，部分版本有望支持 120W 快充。</p><p data-vmark="ebf1"><img
